portals.title: EuProGigant
portals.desc: The Gaia-X lighthouse project for manufacturing. EuProGigant is the first funded binational industrial project with the practical implementation of the Gaia-X principles. It aims to illustrate the technological and economic benefits of the open, European multi-cloud infrastructure Gaia-X.

portals.title: Universitat de Lleida
portals.desc: With the UDL Science portal, Universitat de Lleida aims to provide an open research and science platform following the FAIR guiding principles of findability, accessibility, interoperability and reusability.
